name: Ahmed Ali
text: KAF HA YA 'AIN SAD.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate the beneficence of your Lord on Zachariah, His devotee,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he called to his Lord inwardly,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "O my Lord, my bones decay, my head is white and hoary, yet in calling You, O Lord, I have never been deprived.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But I fear my relatives after me; and my wife is barren. So grant me a successor as a favour from You

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who will be heir to me, and heir to the house of Jacob; and make him obedient to You, O Lord."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O Zachariah," (it was) said, "We give you good news of a son by name of John.' To none have We attributed the name before."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "How can I have a son, O Lord" he said, "when my wife is barren and I am old and decrepit?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The angel) answered: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'This is easy for Me; for when I brought you into being you were nothing.'

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "O Lord, give me a token." "Though sound," He answered, "you will not talk to any one for three nights running."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So he came from the chamber to his people, and suggested to them (by signs) to sing the praises of the Lord morning and evening.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (We said:) "O John, hold fast to the Book;" and We gave him wisdom right from boyhood,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And compassion from Us, and goodness. So he was devout,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And kind to his parents, neither arrogant nor disobedient.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So peace on him the day he was born, the day he will die, and the day that he will be raised from the dead.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate Mary in the Book. When she withdrew from her family to a place in the East

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And took cover from them, We sent a spirit of Ours to her who appeared before her in the concrete form of a man.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "I seek refuge in the Merciful from you, if you fear Him," she said.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He replied: "I am only a messenger from your Lord (sent) to bestow a good son on you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "How can I have a son," she said, "when no man has touched me, nor am I sinful?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'It is easy for Me,' and that: 'We shall make him a sign for men and a blessing from Us.' This is a thing already decreed."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When she conceived him she went away to a distant place.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The birth pangs led her to the trunk of a date-palm tree. "Would that I had died before this," she said, "and become a thing forgotten, unremembered."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then (a voice) called to her from below: "Grieve not; your Lord has made a rivulet gush forth right below you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Shake the trunk of the date-palm tree, and it will drop ripe dates for you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Eat and drink, and be at peace. If you see any man, tell him: 'I have verily vowed a fast to Ar-Rahman and cannot speak to any one this day.'

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then she brought the child to her people. They exclaimed: "O Mary, you have done a most astonishing thing!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a wicked person, nor your mother sinful!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But she pointed towards him. "How can we talk to one," they said, "who is only an infant in the cradle?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "I am a servant of God," he answered. "He has given me a Book and made me a prophet,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And blessed me wherever I may be, and enjoined on me worship and zakat for as long as I live,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And be dutiful to my mother. He has not made me haughty or rebellious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There was peace on me the day I was born, and will be the day I die, and on the day I will be raised from the dead."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This was Jesus, son of Mary: A true account they contend about.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It does not behove God to have a son. Too immaculate is He! When He decrees a thing He has only to say: "Be", and it is.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Jesus only said:) "Surely God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is the straight path."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet the sectarians differed among themselves. Alas for the unbelievers when they see the Terrible Day!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How keenly would they hear and see when they come before Us then, even though today the evil-doers are lost in palpable error.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Warn them of that day of pining when all matters will have been settled, though they would still be unaware and unbelieving (of the truth).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily We shall inherit the earth and whosoever is on it, and to Us they will return.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate Abraham in the Book: He was upright, a prophet.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Remember, when he said to his father: "O my father, why do you worship that which can neither hear nor see nor even profit you the least?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: O my father, to me has come such knowledge as never came to you. So follow me that I may show you the right path.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Why do you worship Satan, O father? Verily Satan was disobedient to Ar-Rahman.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: O my father, I fear lest a punishment from Ar-Rahman should befall you, and you should become a friend of the Devil."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "Are you averse to my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I shall have you stoned to death. So go away for a while from me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He answered: "Peace be on you. I will seek forgiveness of my Lord for you. He has been gracious to me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I will leave you and those you invoke apart from God, and pray to my Lord. Haply in praying to my Lord I will not be deprived."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Thus, when he left them and the (idols) they worshipped, We bestowed on him Isaac and Jacob, and made each of them a prophet,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And bestowed on them some of Our blessings, and gave them high renown.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate Moses in the Book. He was a chosen one, both an apostle and a prophet.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We called him from the right side of the Mount, and brought him close for communion;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And bestowed on him his brother Aaron, a prophet, through Our benevolence.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book. He was true of his promise, and a messenger, a prophet.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He enjoined on his household worship and zakat, and he was obedient to his Lord.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Commemorate Enoch in the Book. He was a truthful person and a prophet,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We raised him to an exalted station.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: These are (some of) those who were favoured by God among the prophets of the progeny of Adam, and of those We bore in the ark with Noah, and the offspring of Abraham and Israel, and of those We guided and We chose, for they bowed weeping in adoration when the revelations of Ar-Rahman were recited to them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they are succeeded by a generation who neglect their devotional obligations and follow only earthly pleasures; but they will reach the wrong road and meet destruction,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except those who repent and come to believe and do the right. These will enter Paradise and will not be wronged the least

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In the gardens of Eden promised by Ar-Rahman to His creatures in the unknown (future). Verily His promise will come to pass.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will hear no vain talk there, but only salutations of peace, and they will have their sustenance morning and evening."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is the Paradise those of Our creatures will inherit who take heed and fear the displeasure of God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "We do not come down," (will the angels say) "but only by your Lord's command." To Him belongs whatever lies before us and behind us, and the space in between. Your Lord does not ever forget:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them. Therefore worship Him, and be constant in His worship. Do you know any namesake of His?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet man says: "When I am dead, will I come to life again?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Does man not remember that before We created him he was nothing?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: By your Lord, We shall gather them and the devils together, then bring them crawling on their knees around Hell.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall pull out of every section those who were most perversely rebellious against Ar-Rahman.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We know best who deserve to be burnt in (the Fire).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There is not one among you who will not reach it. Your Lord has made this incumbent on Himself.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall deliver those who took heed for themselves, and leave the evil-doers kneeling there.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When Our lucid revelations are read out to them, the infidels say to those who believe: "Which of the two groups is better in standing, and whose company is more excellent?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How many generations that had far more wealth and ostentation have We laid low before them!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "Ar-Rahman extends the life of those who are astray until they come to realise what had been promised them was either (physical) affliction or (the terror) of Resurrection. Then will they know who is worse in position, and who is weak in supporters.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: God gives greater guidance to those who are guided; and good deeds that endure are better with your Lord for reward, and better for consequence.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have you seen him who denies Our revelations, and says: "I will certainly be given wealth and children."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Has he peeped into the Unknown, or obtained a promise from Ar-Rahman?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never so. We shall certainly write down what he says, and prolong the extent of his punishment.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: All that he claims will revert to Us, and he will come before Us all alone.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They have taken other gods apart from God that they might be a strength to them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never. They will deny their devotion and become their adversaries.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do you not see that We have set the devils against the infidels to rouse and instigate them?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So, do not be hasty with them. We are counting their number (of days).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The day We shall usher the righteous before Ar-Rahman like envoys into the presence of a king,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And drive the wicked into Hell like cattle driven to water,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: None will have power to intercede for them except one who obtains a promise from Ar-Rahman.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They say: "God has begotten a son."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You have uttered a grievous thing

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Which would cleave the skies asunder, rend the earth, and split the mountains,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For they have attributed a son to Ar-Rahman,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When it does not behove the Merciful to have a son.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There is no one in the heavens and the earth but comes before Ar-Rahman in all obedience.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He has counted them and calculated their number.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Every one of them will come before Him all alone on the Day of Resurrection.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely Ar-Rahman will show love for those who believe and do the right.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We have made this (Qur'an) easy in your tongue that you may give good news to those who take heed, and warn the people who are contentious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How many generations have We laid low before them. Do you see any sign of them, or hear the least whisper of them?
